MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH15 and EH16 postcode areas of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:49pm. Our emergency response team are on their way to the Niddrie Mill substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:37PM on Friday, 23 April 2021.
